AI Predictive Servicing.description: AI-powered tool to predict why hardware is breaking to reduce maintenance cost.
AI Predictive Servicing.fullDescription: While working at SKOPE, I was responsible for building an app that reduced the cost of maintaining their fridges. To do this, I trained a neural network using TensorFlow on their years of previous data to predict the issue based on a number of key points (the fridge model, the fault, etc.). This would be used by the tradies to help them get a better understanding of the issue they were facing. To connect them with the Neural Network a website was built using Flask. My excitement for this project resulted in having what began as a straightforward data analysis task quickly evolve into a full-stack development project. I can't wait to take that same excitement to help me solve more problems that have a similar open-endedness to them.

MapMaker.description: Small software project for quickly designing and prototyping map ideas.
MapMaker.fullDescription: Small software project for quickly designing and prototyping map ideas. This project is packed with interesting features such as different-sized maps, Biomes and the ability to save maps. I learnt so much about the process of developing software with it being my first attempt at making an app. While I never realeased it I am still very proud of the project. Built with Electron using Javascript

Prototypes.description: Collection of visual prototypes were the key focus was recreating a intresting algorithim rather than a full project.
Prototypes.fullDescription: Collection of visual prototypes where the key focus was recreating an interesting algorithm rather than a full project. These are some of my favourite projects as I get to focus and understand something specific that is visually cool to look at. Once I have made something that looks impressive I leave the prototype there to come back to if I need to recreate something for a full project later on.
